Package com.planbase.pdf.layoutmanager.attributes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BorderStyle
    Holds the LineStyles for the top, right, bottom, and left borders of a PdfItem. For an equal border on all sides, use:
    BoxStyle
    Represents the border, padding, background color, and maybe someday margin. Every aspect of this is immutable because it can be specified when various items are created and doesn't need to change, even after line-wrapping.
    CellStyle  
    LineStyle
    Represents the color and width of a line (line meaning a long narrow mark or band). DashStyle (and maybe capStyle or joinStyle?) could be added later. Immutable.
    Padding
    Represents minimum spacing of the top, right, bottom, and left sides of PDF Page Items.
    TextStyle
    Specifies font, font-size, and color.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Align
    Horizontal and vertical alignment options for cell contents
